info.title: Sales
info.description: Unified OpenAPI specification for sales domain

get.description:
Retrieve all available payment gateways - Available for **Directory, Business, and Client Tokens**

**Note:** When using a **Client token**, all fields are returned in the response, but sensitive fields will contain `null` for security and privacy reasons. See response examples below for the differences between token types.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Filter by country, represented using ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes. For example: ['US', 'CA', 'GB']

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Filter by supported currency, represented using ISO 4217 format. For example: ['USD', 'EUR', 'GBP']

200.description: Successful response. All fields are returned in the response. The response content varies based on the token type - see examples below for details.

Directory_or_Business_Token.summary: Response with Directory or Business Token
Directory_or_Business_Token.description: Full response with all fields populated

Client_Token.description: Response with sensitive fields set to null for Client tokens

post.description: Create a new payment gateway - **Only available for Application Tokens**

app_code_name.description: The unique code name of the pre-created gateway's app, created via the API- Creates an app, https://api.vcita.biz/platform/v1/apps

gateway_logo_url.description: The URL or path to the logo of the gateway

default_locale.description: Specifies the fallback locale for the gateway's textual content. If a translation or string is missing, this locale will be used by default.

gateway_type.description: Integration type: a payment service provider (e.g., Stripe, Square) that enables merchants to process multiple payment methods, or a digital wallet (e.g., PayPal, Google Pay) that allows consumers to store and use payment credentials

status.description: Indicates the current status of the payment gateway: 'active' (available for use), 'disabled' (not available for use), or 'deprecated' (still available but not recommended for new integrations)

main_gateway_benefits.description: A clear 3-4 bullet list highlighting the unique features and value of the gateway, aimed at encouraging merchants to connect with it. This information is stored per locale.

locale.description: The locale code (e.g., en, fr, es).

benefits.description: A list of benefits in the specified locale.

brief_benefit_highlights.description: A brief, 2-4 word version of the gateway benefits, tailored for compact displays or mobile interfaces. This information is stored per locale.

locale.description: The locale code (e.g., en, fr, es).

highlights.description: A list of short benefit highlights in the specified locale.

supported_countries.description: A list of countries supported by the payment gateway, represented using ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes. For example: ['US', 'CA', 'GB']

supported_currencies.description: A list of currencies supported by the payment gateway, represented using ISO 4217 format. For example: ['USD', 'EUR', 'GBP']

minimum_charge_amount.description: The minimum value that can be charged using the payment gateway

payment_methods.description: The payment methods supported by the gateway

credit_card.description: Indicates if the gateway supports credit card payments.

ach.description: Indicates if the gateway supports ACH payments.

ideal.description: Indicates if the gateway supports iDeal payments.

bancontact.description: Indicates if the gateway supports Bancontact payments.

twint.description: Indicates if the gateway supports Twint payments.

processing_features.description: The features the payment gateway supports and their current state (enabled/disabled)

multi_currency.description: Indicates if the gateway supports multi-currency transactions.

back_office_charge.description: Indicates if the gateway allows the SMB to process charges directly from the back office.

checkout.description: Indicates whether the payment gateway supports a checkout option initiated from the client portal. This value must always be set to true, as client portal checkout is a core feature.

refund.description: Indicates if the gateway supports full online refunds.

partial_refund.description: Indicates if the gateway supports partial online refunds. Requires full refunds to be enabled.

client_save_card_on_checkout.description: Indicates if clients can save cards on file during a payment flow.

client_save_card_standalone.description: Indicates if clients can save cards on file through a standalone flow.

save_card_by_business.description: Indicates if the gateway supports saving cards on file from the business side.

get.description: Get details of a specific payment gateway - Available for **Directory, Business, and Application Tokens**. Note: Application tokens can only access their own gateway.

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Payment Gateway

put.description: Update an existing payment gateway - Available for **Application Tokens**

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Payment Gateway

gateway_logo_url.description: The URL to the logo of the gateway

delete.description: Delete an existing payment gateway - Available for **Application Tokens**

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Payment Gateway

post.description: Assign a payment gateway to a directory - **Only available for Directory Tokens**

400.description: Bad request. Invalid input data or assignment already exists.

401.description: Unauthorized. The bearer token is missing or invalid.

403.description: Forbidden. You do not have access to this resource.

404.description: Not found. Payment gateway or directory not found.

channel.description: channel type, possible values: email / sms

channel_value.description: channel value, possible values: email / phone number

default.description: Indicates whether the card is the default card for the business. Only true value is accepted. To remove a card's default status, set another card as default instead.

usage_permission.description: Card usage_permission, possible values: all / client

items.description: Items of the sale - Services / Products / Meeting / EventAttendance / ProductOrder

amount.description: Amount of the item. For free items, the amount should be 0

discount.description: Discount as a percent or amount. The discount amount is subtracted from the item total.

amount.description: Discount amount being applied to an item. Valus must be greater than 0.

percent.description: Percentage discount being applied to an item. Value must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 100.

entity_name.description: Name of the entity (will be used in the reports)

entity_type.description: Possible values: Service / Product / Package / Meeting / EventAttendance / ProductOrder / ClientBookingPackage / Custom

rate.description: Tax rate (percentage, up to 3 decimal places). The rate should be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 100.

is_sale.description: Required - Should create a sale (Required value = true)

cancel_payment_statuses_items.description: Cancel the related activities under the sale

total_bookings.description: Total bookings for the provided booking credit. Must be equal or greater than the current booking credit usage.

valid_until.description: Last valid date of the client package (ISO 8601 format). Must be in the future and equal or greater than valid_from value.

parameters.description: Sort by one of the following: created_at, updated_at. available operators: asc, desc. example: sort=created_at:asc,updated_at:desc
parameters.name: sort

is_rounded.description: indicatation whether amount is rounded to the closest dollar

can_client_pay.description: Indicates whether the payment will be made in Client Portal. Default is true

is_rounded.description: indicatation whether amount is rounded to the closest dollar

can_client_pay.description: Indicates whether the payment will be made in Client Portal. Default is true

estimate.billing_address: 1 Bay St, San Francisco, CA, United States
estimate.terms_and_conditions: Payment is due on the specified due date.

business_name.description: The business name. Default value: The business name

display_items_total.description: Indicates wheter items total amounts should be displayed in the estimate. Default is true

display_sections_total.description: Indicates wheter sections total amounts should be displayed in the estimate. Default is true

due_date.description: The date when the estimate is due, in YYYY-MM-DD format (based on the timezone of the business), must be equal or greater than the estimate issue date

estimate_label.description: The invoice label. Default value: ESTIMATE (in the business locale)

estimate_number.description: A unique estimate number. Default value: last estimate number increment by 1

is_signature_required.description: Indicates whether signature is required for the specific estimate

issue_date.description: Estimate date, in YYYY-MM-DD format (based on the timezone of the business)

items.description: An array of estimate item information. At least one item is required (unless sections provided).

discount.description: Discount as a percent or amount. The discount amount is subtracted from the item total.

amount.description: Discount amount being applied to an item. Valus must be greater than 0.

percent.description: Percentage discount being applied to an item. Value must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 100.

item_index.description: the order of the item in the section / estimate (if not inside a section)

quantity.description: The quantity of the item, must be greater than 0.

tax_uids.description: An array of tax UIDs applied to an item. Up to 3 taxes per item are allowed.

unit_amount.description: The unit amount of the item

note.description: A note for the invoice recipient

notify_recipient.description: Indicates whether to send the estimate to the recipient. This can be set only on ISSUED estimate. Default value: true

sections.description: An array of estimate sections information. requires if not general items provided.

invoice.billing_address: 1 Bay St, San Francisco, CA, United States
invoice.terms_and_conditions: Payment is due on the specified due date.

additional_recipients.description: An array of email addresses of additional recipients to notify

allow_online_payment.description: Indicates whether an online payment is allowed for this invoice. This can be set for business with online payment enabled and when connected to a payment gateway. Default value: true when connected to a payment gateway and online payment is enabled for the business.

allow_partial_payment.description: Indicates whether a partial payment is allowed for this invoice. This can be set when online payment is allowed for the invoice. Default value: true when online payment allowed for the invoice and partial payment is enabled for the business.

business_name.description: The business name. Default value: The business name

display_items_total.description: Indicates wheter items total amounts should be displayed in the invoice. Default is true

display_sections_total.description: Indicates wheter sections total amounts should be displayed in the invoice. Default is true

due_date.description: The date when the invoice payment is due, in YYYY-MM-DD format (based on the timezone of the business), must be equal or greater than the invoice issue date

from_estimate_uid.description: The UID of the estimate from which the invoice was created.

invoice_label.description: The invoice label. Default value: INVOICE (in the business locale)

invoice_number.description: A unique invoice number. Default value: last invoice number increment by 1

issue_date.description: Invoice date, in YYYY-MM-DD format (based on the timezone of the business)

items.description: An array of invoice item information. At least one item is required (unless sections provided).

discount.description: Discount as a percent or amount. The discount amount is subtracted from the item total.

amount.description: Discount amount being applied to an item. Valus must be greater than 0.

percent.description: Percentage discount being applied to an item. Value must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 100.

entity_type.description: Possible values: Service / Product / BookingPackage /  Meeting / EventAttendance / ProductOrder / ClientBookingPackage

item_index.description: the order of the item in the section / invoice (if not inside a section)

quantity.description: The quantity of the item, must be greater than 0. The quantity of an item with one of the following entity types must be 1: Meeting / EventAttendance / ProductOrder / ClientBookingPackage

tax_uids.description: An array of tax UIDs applied to an item. Up to 3 taxes per item are allowed.

unit_amount.description: The unit amount of the item

unlink_activities.description: Define whether assocaited activities should be canceled of not. If true, assoicated activited will not be canceled and will be unlinked from the invoice. Otherwise, associated activities will remain attached to the invoice and get canceled.

order.description: The position of the package in the packages list.

parameters.description: Sort by one of the following: created_at, updated_at, due_date, state, entity_type.  available operators: asc, desc. example: sort=created_at:asc,updated_at:desc
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description:
Available filters: client_uid: filter[client_uid][eq]=123. 
                                                                                           matter_uid: filter[matter_uid][eq]=123.
                                                                                           state: filter[state][in]=DUE/OVERDUE/NOT_YET_DUE/PAID/CANCELLED. 
                                                                                           created_at: filter[created_at][eq/lt/lte/gt/gte]=2019-01-01.
                                                                                           updated_at: filter[updated_at][eq/lt/lte/gt/gte]=2019-01-01.
                                                                                           due_date: filter[due_date][eq/lt/lte/gt/gte]=2019-01-01.
                                                                                           entity_type: filter[entity_type][in]=Cart,Invoice,Meeting,EventAttendance,ProductOrder,ClientBookingPackage,Payou,PendingBooking,PendingClientBookingPackage.
                                                                                           entity_uid: allowed only with one matching entity_type. for example: filter[entity_uid][eq]=123&filter[entity_type][in]=Meeting
                                                                                           amount_pending: filter[amount_pending][eq/lt/lte/gt/gte]=100.
                                                                                           amount_paid: filter[amount_paid][eq/lt/lte/gt/gte]=100.
parameters.name: filter

currency.description: The currency of the payment request

net_price.description: net price of the payment request

price.description: total price of the payment request

price_before_coupon.description: The price before coupon. if the payment request contain taxes, then this field value is depended on the tax_mode. if taxes are included inside the value, then the price_before_coupon value should include taxes. otherwise, it should not include taxes.

parameters.description: If the payment's internal uid is known, use it. Otherwise, set it to be the transaction_id and set use_external_id to be true
parameters.name: payment_uid

message.description: Error message for a failed payment

provider_state.description: Custom state set by gateway provider

state.description: The updated state of a payment. For 'pending' payment, it can be either 'paid' or 'failed'. For 'paid' payment, it can be either 'cancelled' or 'refunded'

use_external_id.description: Set it to true if payment_uid is the transaction_id. Otherwise, ignore this parameter.

tax_ids.description: Tax UIDs. Default: product taxes. [] will remove the product's taxes. Up to 3 taxes per product are allowed.
Tax UIDs. [] will remove the product order's taxes. Up to 3 taxes per product order are allowed.

parameters.description: Available filters: display=true / display=false (return only products with display set to true / false). Usage: filter[display]=true. contains=search_string (return only products containing the provided search_string in their name or in their SKU). Usage: filter[contains]=search_string.
parameters.name: filter

post.description: Each business has a limit of 8,500 products

display.description: Display on products list. Default: true

sku.description: Product SKU - must be unique per business
Product SKU - must be unique per business

tax_ids.description: Product Tax IDs. [] will remove the product's taxes. Up to 3 taxes per product are allowed.

amount.description: The amount to refund. If not specified, the remaining amount of the payment will be refunded (original payment amount minus previously refunded amount).

payment_uid.description: The UID of the payment to refund. Either payment_uid or provider_transaction_id is required.

provider_refund_id.description: Provider refund ID. Can be provided when record_refund is set to true.

provider_transaction_id.description: The provider transaction ID of the payment to refund. Either payment_uid or provider_transaction_id is required.

record_refund.description: Record refund. Set to true to record a previously processed refund. Default value: false

refund_time.description: Refund time (in ISO 8601 format). Can be provided when record_refund is set to true.

get.description: Get a list of Scheduled Payment Rules
get.summary: Get list of Scheduled Payment Rules

frequency_type.description: Scheduled Payment Rule frequency type. Possible values: OneTime / Weekly / Monthly

type.description: Scheduled Payment Rule payment method type. Possible values: card

send_receipt.description: Indicates whether to send a receipt to the client

type.description: Scheduled Payment Rule payment method type. Possible values: card

parameters.description:
Tax uids array[] to delete. 
 In case of more than one id, query in URL will appear as: 
 uids[]=ID1&uids[]=ID2
parameters.name: uids[]

default_for_categories.description: Determine fow what categories the tax will be applied as default. Can receive one or more from the following items: 'services', 'products', 'packages'

rate.description: Tax rate (percentage, up to 3 decimal places). The rate should be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 100.

default_for_categories.description: Determine fow what categories the tax will be applied as default. Can receive one or more from the following items: 'services', 'products', 'packages'

rate.description: Tax rate (percentage, up to 3 decimal places). The rate should be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 100.

put.description: Apply default taxes on items (Services/Products/Booking Packages) that don't have any taxes configured

data.message: Default taxes will be applied in the background

default_for_categories.description: Determine fow what categories the tax will be applied as default. Can receive one or more from the following items: 'services', 'products', 'packages'

rate.description: Tax rate (percentage, up to 3 decimal places). The rate should be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 100.

default_for_categories.description: Determine fow what categories the tax will be applied as default. Can receive one or more from the following items: 'services', 'products', 'packages'

rate.description: Tax rate (percentage, up to 3 decimal places). The rate should be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 100.

metadata.description: Set of key-value pairs that can be attached to an object. This can be useful for storing additional information about the object in a structured format. Individual keys can be unset by posting an empty value to them. All keys can be unset by posting an empty value to metadata.

payment_method.description: The payment method used in the transaction

related_provider_payout_id.description: The id of the provider payout that the transaction is a part of

payment_method.description: The payment method used in the transaction

related_provider_payout_id.description: The id of the provider payout that the transaction is a part of

get.description: Fetch summarized data for the Payments widget, including total payments, overdue payments, and pending estimates. This endpoint is accessible with **Staff Tokens** only.

200.description: Successful response containing Payments widget data.

get.description: Fetch detailed data for the Payments forecast widget, providing predictions of future payments on a month-by-month basis. This endpoint is accessible with **Staff Tokens** only.

200.description: Successful response containing Payments forecast data.

get.description: Get a list of Coupons - Available for **Staff Tokens**

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter parameter coupon status, optional values = [active / expiered / scheduled / still_available]

parameters.name: uid_list
parameters.description: Filter the coupon list based on an array of coupon unique identifiers (UIDs)

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: How many items to return per page. Default: 25. Max: 100

get.description: Retrieve all payment cards for a client - Available for **Client Tokens**

max_limit_reached.description: Whether the maximum card limit has been reached

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing JWT token

422.description: Unprocessable Entity - Request cannot be processed

get.description: Retrieve all payment cards for a specific client - Available for **Staff & Internal tokens**

parameters.name: filter[usage_permission]
parameters.description: Filter cards by usage permission scope

422.description: Unprocessable Entity - Request cannot be processed

gateway_uid.description: The unique identifier of the payment gateway to assign

directory_uid.description: The unique identifier of the directory to assign the payment gateway to

total_payments_due.description: The total outstanding amount due for payment requests

current_year.description: Total payment amount collected for the current year.

last_year.description: Total payment amount collected in the previous year.

total_overdue.description: The total overdue amount of payment requests.

total_overdue_count.description: The total number of overdue payment requests.

last_week.description: Total overdue payment requests amount from the last week.

last_week_count.description: Number of overdue payment requests from the last week.

last_month.description: Total overdue payment requests amount from the last month.

last_month_count.description: Number of overdue payment requests from the last month.

old.description: The total amount for overdue payment requests that are older than 30 days.

old_count.description: Count of older overdue payment request transactions that are older than 30 days.

count.description: The total count of pending payment estimates that have not yet been confirmed.

payment_forcast.description: An array of forecasted payment details for each month.

date.description: The date representing the forecasted payment period.

amount.description: The forecasted payment amount for the given date.

PaymentCard.description: Payment card object containing card details and metadata

id.description: Unique identifier for the payment card

client_id.description: UID of the client who owns this card

default.description: Whether this is the default card for the client

active.description: Whether the card is currently active

last_4.description: Last 4 digits of the card number

staff_id.description: UID of the staff member who added this card (if applicable)

staff_name.description: Display name of the staff member who added this card

business_id.description: UID of the business this card belongs to

initiator.description: Who added this card (client or staff)

usage_permission.description: Usage permission scope for the card

max_limit_reached.description: Whether the maximum card limit has been reached

error.description: Error message describing what went wrong

BearerAuth.description: Client JWT token containing entity_uid, business_uid, and type='client'
